item.description:
Singer / Songwriter Teresa Storch is doing a CD release show at the Lizard Lounge in Cambridge for her new album "Stream of Concrete". Have a listen to the music and I think you will agree that she is an artist worth checking out live.

Oh, and I'm not the only one:

"One of the most inventive writers and solid performers coming out of Boston today. Makes me proud to be one." --Vance Gilbert

"Infuses contemporary singer/songwriter with traditional folk vibe...It’s no wonder she’s being recognized in her genre." --Soundcheck Magazine

So come on out for what looks to be a fun Friday night with some new friends.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Teresa Storch at the Lizard Lounge
